viewData.name: PhiRemoval Light S 10ml
viewData.short_description: PhiRemoval Light S is a minimally invasive tattoo removal product intended to successfully remove pigment from the skin.┬á Only for professional use.┬á
viewData.long_description: The light formulation of carefully selected ingredients safely acts on the skin without damaging the skin tissue. Only for professional use.┬á If used properly achieves extraordinary results of pmu or small tattoos removal.┬á For safety reasons, PhiRemoval products are strictly available only to certified PHIREMOVAL students. For approval send your certificate to info@phishop.com/
